block.name: WX GUI Notebook
block.import: from grc_gnuradio import wxgui as grc_wxgui
block.make: #set $parent = $notebook() and 'self.%s.GetPage(%s)'%$notebook() or 'self' self.$(id) = wx.Notebook($(parent).GetWin(), style=$style) #for $label in $labels() self.$(id).AddPage(grc_wxgui.Panel(self.$(id)), "$label") #end for #if not $grid_pos() $(parent).Add(self.$(id)) #else $(parent).GridAdd(self.$(id), $(', '.join(map(str, $grid_pos())))) #end if

Use the Grid Position (row, column, row span, column span) to position the graphical element in the window.
Use the Notebook Param (notebook-id, page-index) to place the graphical element inside of a notebook page.
